questions.ques: An array of n numbers is given, where n is an even number.The maximum as well as the minimum of these n numbers need to be determined,Which of the following is TRUE about the number of comparisons needed?
options: At least nlog2n comparisons are needed
At least 2n-c comparisons, for some constant c, are needed.

questions.ques: Suppose we are sorting an array of eight integers using some quadratic sorting alogorithm.After four iterations of the algorithm's main loop, the array elements are ordered as shown here
options: The algorithm might be insertion sort
The algorithm might be insertion or selection sort
The algorithm might be selection sort
questions.answer: The algorithm might be insertion sort

questions.ques: Program with the highest run-time complexity is
Which of the given options provides the increasing order of asymptotic complexity of functions f1, f2, f3 and f4?
questions.code:
f1(n) = 2^n
f2(n) = n^(3/2)
f3(n) = nLogn
f4(n) = n^(Logn)
